failure_signal.summary: Goal string is missing a closing quote.

confidence.rationale: Token sequence around the goal declaration strongly indicates a single-character quoting error.

alternatives.hypothesis: Insert a closing quote at the end of the goal string.
alternatives.expected_outcome: Parser accepts the goal declaration and compilation continues.

alternatives.hypothesis: Rewrite the full goal line to canonical syntax.
alternatives.expected_outcome: Parse succeeds but may alter wording.

proposed_repair_action.rationale: A narrow syntax patch is likely sufficient and low-risk.
